sentence: It  followed  Hamas  leader  Ismail  Haniyeh  saying  three  of  his  sons  and  several  of  his  grandchildren  were  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike.

sentence: The  car  in  which  three  sons  of  Hamas  leader  Ismail  Haniyeh  were  reportedly  killed  in  an  Israeli  air  strike  is  pictured  in  al-Shati  camp,  west  of  Gaza  City.
